title: opening hour has been changed - 18:00
text: Although TripAdvisor and Google says that it‘s open till 20:00, the entrance is actually closed at 18:00 already. (As to 17th Oct.) If you plan to visit there, I would advise you to arrive at the entrance gate before 17:30, maybe 17:00 in case. Unfortunately we‘ve missed the chance to go up there, even though we‘ve bought tickets beforehand :(.
